title: 001 : Bulbasaur
author: Chris Taylor
description:
After establishing that Magnemite is truly the better Pokemon, we consider how Bulbasaur stacks up to the rankings. Despite his sunbeam, the future's not bright for this leafy Pokemon.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Bulbasaur)
long_description:
After establishing that Magnemite is truly the better Pokemon, we consider how Bulbasaur stacks up to the rankings. Despite his sunbeam, the future's not bright for this leafy Pokemon.

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/SynSpawn), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Joe](https://twitter.com/Prnkt92)

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Bulbasaur)
